data.text:
Day 1 | Morning

Window on World Theme Park

Opening Hours: Open on Sat-Sun,9:30am-5:00pm;Open on Mon-Fri,9:00am-4:30pm

Ticket Price: 799 NT$

Recommended Length of Stay: 3-6 Hours

Location: No. 891, Gaoyuan Rd, Longtan District, Taoyuan City, Taiwan 325

Lilliputian theme park is a rare multi-functional cultural park in Taiwan that presents well-known buildings in a scaled down manner.

Day 1 | Afternoon

Having the chance to enjoy the charming Window on World Theme Park, Daxi Blooming Oasis next to it is another great place that you will never want to miss!

Daxi Blooming Oasis

Opening Hours: 9:00-17:00, restaurant opening hours: 9:00-17:00, farm sales 9:00-16:30.

Ticket Price: 150 NT$

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Hours

Location: 335, Taiwan, Taoyuan City, Daxi District, No. 27, Lane 1093, Section 1, Fuxing Road

Due to the fertile soil and mild climate, the current site of Daxi Huahai Farm was used to grow citronella in the 19th century for the production of citronella oil. Some time later the whole area was converted to green tea and exported. Now Daxi Huahai Farm uses this land to build gardens and restaurants. It is also very pleasant to come here on vacation.

Reviews from Real Guests:

Cathy CHUANG: Suitable for spring and summer, more can enjoy all kinds of artistic flowers

Day 1 | Evening

Don‚Äôt forget to book DA XI LAO CHENG,SI-JI-XING-GUAN in advance, because all the tourists head to Daxi Blooming Oasis love staying at it.

DA XI LAO CHENG,SI-JI-XING-GUAN

With a stay at DA XI LAO CHENG SI JI XING GUAN in Taoyuan City (Daxi District), you'll be within a 10-minute walk of Daxi Old Street and Tashi Park. This bed & breakfast is 10.5 mi (17 km) from Leo Foo Village Theme Park and 9 mi (14.4 km) from Yingge Ceramics Museum.Featured amenities include an elevator and a water dispenser. Free self parking is available onsite.Make yourself at home in one of the 9 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided once per stay.

Day 2 | Morning

Cihu Memorial Sculpture Park

Opening Hours: Open from 8:00am-5:00pm

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Hours

Location: No. 1097, Section 1, Fuxing Rd, Daxi District, Taoyuan City, Taiwan 335

Cihu in Daxi Town, Taoyuan County, Taiwan, is very similar to Chiang Kai-shek's home in Zhejiang, so he chose the palace before his death and the cemetery after his birth. After the death of Chiang Ching-kuo, he was also enshrined here, next to Cihu. Based on this, Taoyuan County strives to build a two-Jiang Cultural Park and expects to attract Luke. The park consists of Cihu Mausoleum, Cihu Memorial Sculpture Park, Cihu Visitor Center, and Daxi Mausoleum.

Reviews from Real Guests:

Trip.com User: The scenery inside is very good. The statue is very complete. It is suitable for the whole family to walk around.

Day 2 | Afternoon

Now we come to another great highlight in the city: Taoyuan Xiangu.

Taoyuan Xiangu

Opening Hours: Open from 8:00am-5:00pm

Ticket Price: 350 NT$

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Hours

Location: No. 5-1, Shanggaorao, Changxing Vil., Fuxing Township, Taoyuan, TaiwanNo.5-1, 5th Neighborhood, Shanggaorao Village, Fuxing District, Taoyuan County

The 200-hectare Taoyuan Fairy Valley is located in Fuxing Township, Taoyuan. It is a leisure park with a variety of flowers, plants and trees. Every winter and spring, the tulips bloom beautifully, attracting a large number of people to enjoy the flowers. A variety of flowers and plants are planted in Taoyuan Fairy Valley. Different flowers bloom in the four seasons. Many butterflies will also fly in the flowers, and there are beautiful scenery all year round. Going down the stairs of sleepers, there are sand pushers and a small hydrophilic pool next to Baiquan Stream. In summer afternoons, you can roll up your pants and play by the stream to drive away the hot summer heat.

Day 3 | Afternoon

After finishing the tour at Daxi Old Street, you can head to Pushin-Ranch, the most worth visiting place around the corner.

Pushin-Ranch

Ticket Price: 300 NT$

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Hours

Location: No.119, Gaoshanding, Yangmei City, Taoyuan County, Taiwan

Weiquan Puxin Ranch is one of the farms in northern Taiwan. It is a large dairy farm established by Weiquan Company in response to the government's policy of developing the dairy industry. Today's Puxin Ranch has developed quite well. In the early days of the pasture, the environment was actively greened, and lakeside fishing areas, horse riding fields and archery fields were built. There are many entertainment facilities, which are very worth seeing.

Day 3 | Evening

After visiting the glorious Pushin-Ranch, South Garden Hotels And Resorts nearby is the best place to stay.

South Garden Hotels And Resorts

The South Garden Hotels And Resorts (Taoyuan Zhongli Nanfang Zhuangyuan Dujia Fandian) is located 10 minutes from Taoyuan's high-speed railway station and 25 minutes from Taoyuan International Airport, allowing for convenient access to a number of scenic areas in northern Taiwan.

The on-site restaurant serves both Chinese and Western fare. Room service is also available. Live music, drinks and snacks can be enjoyed at the bar.

A spacious banquet hall able to accommodate 40 tables and a 192 sq m (2,304 sq ft) conference room are available to host meetings, conferences, banquets and other events. This 5-star Taoyuan hotel also offers free parking and Wi-Fi access throughout the property.

In addition to the largest indoor spa pool in Taiwan, other recreational amenities include a fully equipped fitness center, a kids' playroom, an aroma therapy room and hot spring and sauna center.

Day 4 | Morning

Taipei Golf Club

Ticket Price: 3850 NT$

Location: No. 34-1, Chisaki, Luzhu District, Taoyuan City

The golf course of Taipei Golf Club covers an area of 177 hectares. It is located on the hillside of Linkou, extending across New Taipei City and Taoyuan City. With beautiful scenery, fresh air and green hills, it is an ideal place for golf lovers. There are 36 holes of regular fairways, which are divided into four areas: A, B, C, and D. The main characteristics of the fairways in the AB area are continuous fairways, small slope differences, and many fairways changes. The main characteristics of the fairways in the CD area are linear, with long yardage and large fairway slope differences. There is a standard 250-yard driving range fairway and a central public course (short nine holes), each hole is 110~136 yards long, suitable for beginners, etc. There are also real-world practice greens, chipping, and bunker practice areas.

Day 5 | Evening

Don‚Äôt forget to book The Westin Tashee Resort Taoyuan in advance, because all the tourists head to Cihu love staying at it.

The Westin Tashee Resort Taoyuan

The Westin Tashee Resort Taoyuan provides a great place for travelers to relax after a busy day. Visitors to Taoyuan will find that the Westin Tashee Resort Taoyuan is a fantastic accommodation choice.

The hotel is located approximately 20km from Taoyuan Railway Station and 38km from Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport. The nearby area boasts an abundance of attractions including Fushanting Phra Phrom, Wuliaojian Mountain and Daxi Old Street.

At the end of a busy day, travelers can unwind and relax in the hotel or go out and enjoy the city. Guests of this Taoyuan hotel can make use of the parking facilities.

Germaphobes can rest easy - the level of cleanliness is highly rated at this hotel.

Day 6 | Morning

Republic of Chocolate

Opening Hours: Tuesday-Friday: 9:30-17:00 (sales until 15:30), Saturdays and Sundays: 9:30-18:00 (sales until 16:30), closed every Monday (in the event hall) During the maintenance period, the closing time will be announced separately).

Ticket Price: Free

Recommended Length of Stay: 2-3 Hours

Location: No. 177, Qiaokeli St, Bade District, Taoyuan City, Taiwan 334

The Chocolate Republic located in Taoyuan is a famous chocolate museum in Southeast Asia and a veritable chocolate country. The appearance of the museum is like a piece of chocolate that has been peeled and melted into thick syrup. It is delicious just by looking at it. There are two parts in the museum area and the outdoor area, allowing visitors to fully understand the history of cocoa beans, the planting environment, and the production of chocolate. the process of. Apart from the knowledge of chocolate, it is of course important to taste the delicious chocolate that fascinates the whole world. It‚Äôs not enough to just eat it. There is also a cooking class. Under the guidance of the chef, step by step, you can create chocolate full of love by yourself.

", the complex and complex level of feelings, only to personally taste, to feel the taste of a good, and strive to live in the present!

Day 6 | Afternoon

When time permits after visiting Republic of Chocolate, don‚Äôt forget pay a visit to Zhongzheng Park.

Zhongzheng Park

Opening Hours: Open 24 hours

Ticket Price: Free

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Hours

Location: Tong'an St, Taoyuan District, Taoyuan City, Taiwan 330

The park is lush with greenery, shady trees, tall and towering ancient trees, and the natural beauty of Wuling Bridge and Daxi can be seen from the heights. In winter, birds such as magpies, five-colored birds, pink parrot beaks and green embroidered eyes can often be seen. , is a natural ecological park with rich resources.

Day 6 | Evening

Don‚Äôt forget to book Monarch Plaza Hotel in advance, because all the tourists head to Zhongzheng Park love staying at it.

Monarch Plaza Hotel

The Monarch Plaza Hotel was recently renovated in 2021, making it a fantastic choice for those staying in Taoyuan.

The hotel is conveniently located just 5km from Taoyuan Railway Station and 17km from Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport. This hotel is located near many of Taoyuan's attractions including Dasi Old Town, Zhongzheng Park (Tongan St.) and Taoyuan Arts Plaza.

When guests have some time on their hands they can make use of the onsite facilities. Airport pickup can be arranged by the hotel upon request. This Taoyuan hotel provides parking on site.

Day 7 | Morning

Hutoushan Environmental Park

Opening Hours: Open from 6:00am-0:00am

Ticket Price: Free

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Hours

Location: Section 3, Chenggong Rd, Taoyuan District, Taoyuan City, Taiwan 330

Hutoushan Environmental Park covers an area of about 2.5 hectares. The park has complete public facilities such as telescopes, seats, parking lots and landscape pavilions. This isn't just a landfill turned park. And the night view of the park is also quite beautiful. It is not like coming here at night to have a cup of coffee and enjoy the bright starry sky.

Reviews from Real Guests:

SandyC: Hutou Mountain is our back garden, as long as you have time, you will want to go. It takes about an hour to go around the back mountain. The amount of exercise is just right. Sometimes you can watch the sea of clouds in front of the temple after the rain. It is a beautiful scenery.

Trip.com User: It's really beautiful to watch the night scene in Hutou Mountain, but the wind is quite big at that time. I remember to bring a few more clothes and jackets.

Day 7 | Evening

After visiting the glorious Little Wu-Lai, Prado Hill Holiday nearby is the best place to stay.

Prado Hill Holiday

The Prado Hill Holiday is an ideal spot for travelers wanting to discover the city. The Prado Hill Holiday is an ideal choice for travelers who want to take in the sights and sounds of Taoyuan.

Taoyuan Railway Station and Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport are located 28km and 51km away respectively. There is no shortage of things to see in the area, with the Jiaoban Mt. Park, Green Light Forest and Siqinting all nearby.

In their spare time, guests can explore the hotel's surroundings. Guests of this Taoyuan hotel can make use of the parking facilities.

According to our trusted guests, the facilities at this hotel are first-rate.

Day 8

Dream Valley

Opening Hours: Open all day

Recommended Length of Stay: 1.0-2.0 Days

Location: Lukou Xiangkou Village, Taoyuan CountyLukou Xiangkou Village, Taoyuan County

"Xunmeng Valley in Kou Village, Luzhu Township, Taoyuan County is located in Kou Village, Luzhu Township, Taoyuan County. It is surrounded by mountains and has beautiful scenery. It covers an area of about ten hectares and is built according to the terrain. There are three major parts, including the Xunmeng Valley area. Among them, the most popular is the grass skating field. Due to the large space, there are two types of grass skating and sledding. Xunmeng Valley is suitable for leisure and vacation, bringing you a dreamlike and wonderful difference. feeling."

Day 8 | Evening

After visiting the glorious Dream Valley, Fullon Hotel Taoyuan nearby is the best place to stay.

Fullon Hotel Taoyuan

The Fullon Hotel Taoyuan is an ideal spot for travelers wanting to discover the city. The Fullon Hotel Taoyuan is an ideal choice for travelers who want to take in the sights and sounds of Taoyuan.

The hotel is conveniently located just 4km from Taoyuan Railway Station and 16km from Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport. There is no shortage of things to see in the area, with the Taoyuan Arts Plaza, Zhongzheng Park and Fenghe Park all nearby.

In their spare time, guests can explore the hotel's surroundings. For those driving themselves, parking is provided on site.

Guests tell us the location of this hotel is fantastic.
